alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong shower will impact portions of northwestern Whiteside, Carroll, Jo Daviess, western Stephenson, northeastern Clinton, Jackson and southeastern Dubuque Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 112 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower along a line extending from Benton to near Bellevue to near Maquoketa. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Galena, Bellevue, Springbrook, and Council Hill around 115 PM CDT. Hanover, Elizabeth, Scales Mound, and Spragueville around 120 PM CDT. Preston, Green Island, and Schapville around 125 PM CDT. Woodbine, Miles, Apple River, and Massbach around 130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Savanna, Stockton, Warren, Sabula, Andover, Nora, Mount Carroll and Lena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
